r.d: Generic server class based on ext/sockets, used to develop any kind of server.
r.n: After two years of being alpha, this is the first stable version. Many bugs have been fixed: - Fixing bug #2761 - Fixing request #5907: setEndCharacter - Fixing request #4462IPv6 support - Fixing bug: If the server is under full load, it can happen that two data packets are delivered when doing a single socket_read() call. If that happens, the two packets are delivered as one. - Adding onIdle handler
